title: Bug 47910 ajc outjar jarfile does not contain MANIFEST.MF
description: When using the ajc outjar command, the resulting jar file does not contain the expected MANIFEST.MF file.
OB: When the ajc outjar command is used, the resulting file should be a valid jar file and should include the MANIFEST.MF file.
EB: The resulting jar file generated by the ajc outjar command should contain the expected MANIFEST.MF file.
SR: The ajc outjar command should be modified to include the MANIFEST.MF file in the resulting jar file.
